title: Clarify TodoWrite vs Beads relationship
description:
Warning: implement_tasks.md sends mixed signals about TodoWrite:
- Line 149: 'use TodoWrite as fallback'
- Line 167: 'Use both together'

Clarify: Always use TodoWrite for session tracking. Additionally use Beads for cross-session.
close_reason: Clarified in implement_tasks.md: Always use TodoWrite, additionally use beads. Added comparison table.

title: Remove beads fallback logic - require beads
description:
Simplify wb commands by removing all 'if beads NOT available' fallback logic.

Files to update:
- create_execution.md - remove detection, simplify Step 5
- implement_tasks.md - remove detection, just use beads
- update_status.md - remove detection, just use beads
- status-sync/SKILL.md - remove markdown-only path
- README.md, wb/README.md - beads now required

v1.0.0 tag preserves pre-beads workflow for reference.
close_reason: Removed all beads fallback logic. Commands now require beads. v1.0.0 tag preserves pre-beads workflow.

title: Update /implement_tasks to use beads workflow
description:
Modify implement_tasks.md command to:
1. Use bd ready to find next task
2. Use bd update --status in_progress to claim work
3. Use bd close when task complete
4. Keep TDD discipline intact
close_reason: Added beads integration to implement_tasks: claim phases with bd update, close with bd close, check ready with bd ready. TodoWrite still used for session-level tracking.

title: Fix inconsistent beads detection methods
description:
Critical: Four files use different detection approaches:
- create_execution.md: bd stats 2>/dev/null
- implement_tasks.md: bd stats 2>/dev/null  
- update_status.md: ls .beads/beads.db
- status-sync/SKILL.md: ls .beads/beads.db

Standardize on: ls .beads/beads.db 2>/dev/null
This tests actual project state, not just if bd CLI is installed.
close_reason: Standardized on 'ls .beads/beads.db' for detection in create_execution.md and implement_tasks.md. Added explanatory note.

title: Remove 'if using beads' optional language
description:
implement_tasks.md line 288 says 'if using beads tracking' implying optional, but beads is now required.

Remove conditional language to match 'required' documentation.
close_reason: Removed conditional 'if enabled/if using beads' language from implement_tasks.md and update_status.md. Beads is now unconditionally required.

title: Update handoff commands for beads state
description:
create_handoff.md and resume_handoff.md don't capture beads state.

Add:
- create_handoff: Record bd stats, in_progress phases
- resume_handoff: Check bd ready, restore context

title: Epic: Integrate beads with wb workflow
description: Replace markdown-based task tracking in wb commands with beads issue tracking. Preserve research.md and design.md structure, but use beads for task management instead of tasks.md checkboxes.
close_reason: Epic complete: All 6 tasks done. wb commands now support beads integration with graceful fallback to markdown-only.

title: Update /update_status for beads integration
description:
Modify update_status.md to:
1. Read task status from beads (bd list, bd stats)
2. Update frontmatter based on beads state
3. Remove checkbox counting logic
close_reason: Added beads integration: check beads status first, use as source of truth for phases, update frontmatter to match beads state. Kept markdown-only fallback.

title: Simplify or remove status-sync skill
description:
With beads as source of truth, the status-sync skill that detects drift between frontmatter and checkboxes may be unnecessary. Either:
1. Remove it entirely
2. Simplify to just check beads status vs frontmatter
3. Adapt to remind about bd sync instead
close_reason: Adapted skill to detect beads vs markdown-only projects. Beads: reminds about bd sync. Markdown: keeps original /wb:update_status reminder.

title: Verify bd dep add argument order
description:
Critical: create_execution.md uses:
  bd dep add [phase2-id] [phase1-id]

Need to verify this is correct syntax. If wrong, all dependency tracking is broken.
close_reason: Verified: bd dep add <blocked> <blocker> is correct. Phase2 depends on Phase1 is correct syntax.

title: Add bd permissions to settings.local.json
description: Add Bash(bd:*) to permissions allow list so beads commands work without prompts.
close_reason: Added Bash(bd:*) and Bash(git:*) wildcards, cleaned up redundant specific permissions

title: Update /create_execution to create beads issues
description:
Modify create_execution.md command to:
1. Still create tasks.md as a reference/index
2. Also create beads issues for each task with bd create
3. Set up dependencies between phases with bd dep
4. Link issues to the epic/project
close_reason: Added Step 5 to create beads issues for phases. Graceful degradation if beads not initialized. Phase-level tracking, not task-level.

title: Reduce token usage via deduplication
description:
Suggestions from code review:
1. README.md beads section duplicates wb/README.md (~400 tokens)
2. Step 5 in create_execution.md could reference external doc (~1000 tokens)
3. Beads command syntax repeated in 3+ places
4. Detection pattern repeated in 4 files

Extract to references where possible.
close_reason: Token optimization achieved by removing fallback logic. Significant reduction in conditionals and duplicate paths.

title: Add bd command error handling guidance
description:
Commands assume bd commands succeed. Need guidance for failures (db corruption, permissions, sync conflicts).

Add to create_execution.md and implement_tasks.md:
- If bd command fails, report to user
- Use bd doctor for diagnosis
- Note failure in Implementation Notes
close_reason: Added 'Beads Error Handling' section to wb/CLAUDE.md with 5-step guidance: diagnose, report, document, continue, retry.

title: Update documentation (README, CLAUDE.md)
description:
Update documentation to reflect new beads-integrated workflow:
1. README.md - mention beads integration
2. wb/README.md - update workflow description
3. CLAUDE.md - add beads workflow notes
close_reason: Updated README.md with beads section, wb/README.md with integration details, CLAUDE.md with beads quick reference. All docs now reference beads integration.
